*15 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Chople''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by planting [[Spelon]] and equipping the [[Blaze Cassette]]. The Spelon will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. This berry can be bought from the Johto [[Berry Master]] for 10,000 {{farmpoints}} if the player is running the "No Oak Item" [[Challenge Mode|challenge]], and has already unlocked the Spelon berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !!
